Ad Only Plugin

In this topic, you will learn how to use the Ad Only plugin to allow you to play IMA3 ads in a player with no normal video content.

The ad only plugin is no longer needed. To create a Brightcove player that only plays ads, see the Brightcove Player Sample: Outstream (Ad-Only) Player document.
